EmailTemplate.subject: Meet Rocketbook!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> FREE Shipping* Rocketbook
A Classic Notebook Built For The Digital Age Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Rocketbook/_/N-1yzp5fs?showMoreIds=8?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBERCAMPAIGN191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Rocketbook/_/N-1yzp5fs?showMoreIds=8?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBERCAMPAIGN191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Write
Use any of our reusable notetaking products for a traditional handwriting experience. Reuse
No more notepaper guilt! When paired with Pilot FriXion ink, the pages of your Everlast can be wiped clean with water & a cloth. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Rocketbook/_/N-1yzp5fs?showMoreIds=8?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBERCAMPAIGN191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Rocketbook/_/N-1yzp5fs?showMoreIds=8?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBERCAMPAIGN191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Organize
Use the free Rocketbook app to configure popular cloud services as your scan destinations. Scan
Start scanning your notes, to-do lists & ideas. See green, snap, and your notes are visually enhanced & automatically sent to the right destination. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Rocketbook/_/N-1yzp5fs?showMoreIds=8?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBERCAMPAIGN191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
